displayName.french: Fuite des égouts impériaux
displayName.spanish: Has escapado de las alcantarillas imperiales

description.english: Escaped the Imperial Sewers, Main Quest Beginning
description.german: Du bist aus der Kanalisation der Kaiserstadt entkommen. Die Hauptquest beginnt
description.french: Vous avez fui les égouts impériaux, la quête principale commence
description.italian: Sei fuori dalle fognature imperiali; la missione principale ha inizio
description.spanish: Has escapado de las alcantarillas imperiales; empieza la misión principal.
description.schinese: 逃离帝国下水道，主线任务开始
description.japanese: メインクエストを開始して帝都下水道を脱出した
description.polish: Ucieczka z cesarskich kanałów. Początek głównego zadania.
description.brazilian: Escapou do esgoto imperial, início da Missão Principal.

displayName.german: Tor ins Reich des Vergessens geschlossen

displayName.french: Sanctuaire de Dagon localisé
